credit_line: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Gifford M. Lloyd
title: Amoskeag Falls, Manchester, N.H.
inscriptions: l.r. in pencil: pt6/ 20 00; LITH OF ENDICOTT & Co N. Y.;l.l.  J. B. BACHELDER; u.c. no. 15/Album of NEW ENGLAND SCENERY; l.c. FROM THE AMOSKEAG BRIDGE/DOWNWARD VIEW/AMOSKEAG FALLS, MANCHESTER, N.H./To the Citizens of Manchester this picture is most respectfully dedicated by the Publisher/Entered according to Act of Congress in the year 1856 by J. B. Bachelder in the Clerks Office of the District Court of N. Hampshire  J. B. Bachelder/59 Beekman St. New York
